direction.raw_text: . SMART BAR IN BEVERLY HILLS - NIGHT It is the kind of bar where the well-to-do folks of LA go to pick up - or be picked up. Lesser-known actors, agents and executives of all ages. Into this bar comes Ben. Ben is in his thirties. He is wearing an Armani suit that could use a visit to the dry-cleaner's. He hasn't shaved in the last twenty-four hours (but neither has any of the actors in the bar). He is a good-looking man but is clearly in trouble of some kind. Although still in control of his faculties, it becomes clear in the following scene that he is much the worse for wear with drink. He looks around the room until he sees someone he recognizes and then walks over to a table where two couples are seated. The men are young execs, the girls, both blonde and busty, have very white teeth and smile all of the time. The camera follows Ben over to the table. One of the execs looks up as Ben gets close. He recognizes him but delays his recognition until the last moment in the hope that Ben is not looking at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peter
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben... how are you, man? They shake hands. Ben is not invited to take a seat and Peter waits for a while before being forced to introduce him to the table. Ben Sanderson, Marc Nussbaum, Sheila, Debbie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice to meet you. I think I spoke to you on the phone a couple of years ago. Weren't you both at MGM with Laddie?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right. Are you still at ICM?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I'm at Tri-Star now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's great. Say hello to Mike for me. That's a beautiful dress, Debbie, and those are fabulous earrings, Sheila. There is an awkward silence. Ben does not make a move and is not invited to join them. The girls smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I gotta tell you, I'm a big fan of your writing. I loved Bay of Pigs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks a lot. I didn't actually write it, I just got the credit. I was fired. (to Peter) Can I talk to you for a moment? Peter gets up and he and Ben walk to the door together. Peter speaks very quietly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, Ben, I can't help you any more. Do you understand?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Promise. I just need some cash tonight. I lost my credit cards. The money'll be on your desk first thing tomorrow morning, Scout's honor. How's the new one coming along? I here you got Richard Gere. The two men look at each other for a while. Peter's friends are looking at them, as are other people in the room. Peter takes out his wallet and extracts some notes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is all I have in cash. Please don't drink it here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, that's fine. I'll messenger it over to you tomorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want it. Ben... I think it would be best if you didn't contact me again. And he turns and walks away, back to his table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ; 'LAS VEGAS - 1.20 A.M.'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HELICOPTER SHOT - DAY Las Vegas. A blaze of color in the middle of a desert. Credit sequence begins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOBBY OF EXPENSIVE HOTEL - NIGHT A mixture of businessmen and gamblers creates a sense of activity and superficial excitement. Music wafts across the soundtrack, almost drowned by the dense texture of thousands of slot machines, creating an insane New Age symphony. Credit sequence ends. Into the lobby from the street comes Sera. It's hard to tell how old Sera is - somewhere between twenty-five and thirty-five. She is a beautiful American girl. Her face has the freshness of a model in a Sears catalogue. She is dressed simply in a short black skirt and matching jacket. High heels complete the picture. Heads turn as she passes a group of businessmen and it's clear they find her very sexy. She acknowledges their glance with a half-smile and steps into the elevator. She could be a secretary, or a PA to one of the many execs here in Las Vegas at a convention. The body language is a bit different, though.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PENTHOUSE SUITE OF HOTEL - NIGHT A view of night-time Las Vegas through a window. Traffic up and down The Strip; bright, gaudy neon flashing and winking. We hear the sound of men laughing and the camera pulls focus and we see reflected in the glass... ...a group of people. On the table are bowls of potato chips and dip and sandwiches. The TV is on at a sports channel and two boxers pound the shit out of each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ELEVATOR - NIGHT Sera looks at herself in the gold-tinted mirror in the elevator. She takes out a lipstick and freshens her lips. Some people get out and the elevator climbs higher. We see from the indicator that she has punched the Penthouse button. Camera moves in tighter and we see that she is nervous but concealing it well. The elevator stops, the doors open and she steps right into the Penthouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PENTHOUSE - NIGHT A bottle of Scotch is almost empty. The man talking is Yuri. He is Russian, in his early forties, a little overweight, a big man wearing a blue silk suit. His thick black hair is greased and combed back. He wears a lot of jewelry, all gold. Rings, a bracelet and a Rolex. Two men in business suits and a weird stoned woman in her late thirties listen to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...but please, my friends, call me Yuri. It is my American name... I picked it myself. The three people laugh. There is a hint of contempt in the way that they speak to Yuri.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you from, Yuri? I mean, you sure don't talk like you're from this neck of the woods. Yuri smiles at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... you are right, my friend. How very observant you are. I am from Latvia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tough place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I hear this too. But I am not a tough man. I am a simple man who is here to learn from my new American friends. The door opens and Sera comes in. Everybody stares at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is this your friend, Yuri?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, yes... Sera. The second businessman takes out a small manila envelope from his inside pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera is my gift to you, my friends from New York City. You may do with her as you wish in this beautiful room, which is also my gift for the night to my friends. You will find her a very willing girl, for all of you...just as we arranged. Yuri smiles again as the Second Businessman hands him the envelope. The rest of them just stare at Sera, aroused by the idea of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course, Yuri. I think you'll find this just as we discussed. Yuri gets up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, my friends... I have other business to attend. Enjoy. He heads for the door, passing Sera. She holds out his arm as he passes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yuri... please! Can I talk to you for a moment. Still smiling, he takes Sera's arm and leads her into the bedroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My friends... excuse me for just one moment. 7 INT. BEDROOM - NIGHT Mirrors reflect mirrors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want this. Yuri, please. I really don't want this. You know I don't like to do groups.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want this, Sera. I need this! SERA Please, Yuri. He holds put his arms. Sera goes to him. He hugs her with one arm. He pulls up her skirt so that her panties are exposed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These are pretty. Sera watches in the mirror as he pulls her panties to reveal her buttocks. He strokes her there gently with his other hand. We see that there are two fine scars there. He speaks gently, like a father to a daughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is this how you would repay me for coming all this way to find you again? Driving through the desert to protect my little Sera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROOM - NIGHT Yuri and Sera - different time, different place. Sera looking frightened, backing away from Yuri, who pulls a switchblade from his jacket and opens it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PENTHOUSE - NIGHT Yuri enters from the bedroom. The weird woman is doing a line of coke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera wanted me to ask if she might undress at once for you. She has a very beautiful undergarment witch she would like you to see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera comes into the room. She smiles and begins unbuttoning her jacket. She takes it off and drops it on the floor, and then unzips her skirt and steps out of it. Sera is now in control and playing the room. In the background. Yuri leaves the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come here. Sera walks over and something strange takes place between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S BAR. LA - MORNING The bar is dark but through a small window we see that it is a very bright sunny day outside. The bartender reads the Los Angeles Times. The bar surface is red vinyl. There are five customers, all single men. One of them is Ben and he is sitting at the bar watching TV. A game show is in progress and the TV sound is loud. Ben finishes his drink and grimaces before indicating to the barman that he'd like a repeat. Barman pours him a whiskey - Cranberry - and the camera moves in closer to Ben, ending in a close-up. Ben takes a big hit from the drink and concentrates on the TV. We hear from the TV sound that it is a word game with a big prize. Ben smiles to himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The talk show hostess, an American TV beauty, is showing the audience the prizes available in today's game show.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As he finishes that drink and asks for another. The camera moves in close on his eyes. BEN'S POV OF TV She turns from the prizes and looks straight into the TV camera, which starts zooming into her. At first, what she is saying makes complete sense, but then things change...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just look at this studio, Ben, filled with glamorous merchandise, including an extra special prize chosen just for You! A big, bad, BMW motorcycle, complete with saddle bags stuffed with thousands of US dollars. "There are oohs" from the audience.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, Ben, (tosses her hair) Let's find a bar, get drunk and go for a ride. The studio lights dim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then we can get a suite somewhere and order up a case of champagne while we fuck ourselves silly. Close-up on males in the audience doing the grunt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is it, just for You, Ben. She unbuttons her top, licks her fingers and makes her nipples hard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because You've been so patient, and because I want to fuck you, take care of You, and because there's nothing else in the world worth doing. Section of the audience clapping - some women dabbing their eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell you what, Ben, let's go to Las Vegas. The bars stay open twenty four hours night and day. Just you, just me, Ben, think about it, all right? ANGLE ON BEN Lost in his fantasy
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll think about it. He looks back at the screen, but the show has returned to what is known as "normal". He finishes his drink and then an attack of nausea hit him. He takes a deep breath and rolls his neck and his head. The barman puts down a fresh drink. Ben looks at his own hands...which are steady.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should go on that show.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMART BUSINESS SPACE - MORNING Ben sitting at a desk with a phone wedged on his ear, a cup of black coffee on the desk. The walls are covered with framed film posters and one complete wall has shelves jammed with scripts. He nods from time to time and sometimes says 'yes' or 'OK', but it becomes clear that there is no one on the other end. He drinks from the coffee cup. A woman comes up to his desk, a business colleague. She puts a wad of messages down on the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, but what's the back end like? By the time we're through with P and A, the above-the line is going to take it to about fifteen and with something like this... I don't know if Disney will go for it... can I call you back on this? OK... chow for now. (to the woman) Good morning.

direction.raw_text: Ben... Mr. Simpson was looking for you. I said that you had a doctor's appointment. He said for you to go in as soon as... are you OK?

direction.raw_text: I'm fantastic, but I gotta go out now... very important meeting, could make a coupla million for the company. Ben gets up and as he passes her he grabs her and dances a few steps. It is clear that she likes Ben, but when his face gets close to hers she smells the alcohol on his breath and she turns away. Ben stops dancing and smiles sadly.

direction.raw_text: Ben?

direction.raw_text: You should go now. She leaves the room and Ben goes through some routine at the desk. He opens a drawer of a filing cabinet and puts in his whole arm, looking for something at the very back. He pulls out a small vodka bottle and opens it and then pours the contents into his coffee cup. With cup in hand he leaves the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMART OFFICE - DAY Ben is sitting opposite his boss, Mr. Simpson, who is very upset. He hands Ben an envelope. Ben opens it and pulls out a check. He looks at the amount.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is to generous Peter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... we liked having you around, Ben, but you know how it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure thing... and I'm sorry. Ben takes a swig from his coffee cup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... what are you going to do now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought I might move out to Las Vegas. Simpson looks puzzled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bars never close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S BMW  DAY Ben drives though Beverly Hills. He pours the content of a small bottle of vodka into an empty Coke can, puts the empty bottle under the seat and then drinks from the can. He slips a tape into the player and we hear "Lonely Teardrops", by Michael McDonald, one of Ben's favorite songs. At a traffic light a cop on a bike pulls up next to him and Ben takes a pull from the Coke can and smiles, mouths the word "hot". The cop nods back at him, the light changes and they both pull away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SANTA MONICA STREET  DAY Ben carries a brown paper bag which clinks. Camera follows him as he walks down the street. He looks at... BEN'S POV A girl walking ahead of him in the same direction. She is walking her dog. She is attractive from behind. We hear Ben's thoughts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beautiful, no just the shape which is nice, but the whole walk, the feeling, the movement. This girl is pleased with herself. Maybe this is the only art I can appreciate... I don't know if this is good or bad, but right now she is really beautiful. When I was a boy it would have been really important that she have a pretty face, to go with this body, I mean. I still would like to see her face, but her beauty is no dependent on her face. The dog gets interested in something on the sidewalk and she bends down to pull at its collar. BEN (voice-over) I wonder what kind of panties she's wearing. Shit, that's too specific, but... on the other hand, you can never be too specific... but then, the infinitesimal must be, by definition, as infinite as the infinite. Suddenly the girl stops. Ben catches up with her and cannot resist looking into her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God, she's so young. The girl sees Ben and smiles an innocent smile,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi... CUT TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S HOUSE IN SANT MONICA - DAY Ben walks up to his house still carrying the paper bag. A young boy of about thirteen years of age is fixing a beat-up bike. Ben greets him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Brad... how's it going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Ben. There were a couple of guys looking for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did they look like?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suits. I didn't tell them anything. You know anything about gears? Ben takes a look. The gear mechanism is all bent out of shape. He bends down to have a look. It is clear from the way he deals with this mechanical problem that he's good with his hands. He doesn't try to force anything but he moves the chain and gear mechanism to get to the problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How'd this happen? BRAD I was going real fast down on the beach and something slipped and everything got jammed up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The news is not good, kid. This bit here... see there... it's broken. You need a new  one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. I'll find out though. Ben gets up, picks up his bottles and heads for his house. He looks back and Brad is sitting still by the bike, looking totally dejected. This really seems to upset Ben.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S HOUSE - AFTERNOON Ben is naked and the shower can be heard in the background. The house is austere, only the minimum of furnishing. He pours a large tumbler of vodka and takes a gulp, then tops up the glass. He turns on the stereo, selects a record - Miles Davis, Kind of Blue - and puts it on the turntable. He turns on the cassette recorder and inserts a new blank tape. He puts the machine into the record mode. He kneels down next to the deck and with complete precision puts the needle on the second track without any problem. The music starts and continues through the next sequence. 17 INT. SHOVER - DAY Ben is in the shower with the glass in his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BATHROOM - DAY Ben shaving with the glass in his hand. He does the area around his mouth first so that he can drink while he does the rest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LIVING SPACE - DAY Showered and shaved and wearing a smart dark suit, Ben looks handsome and normal. He selects another record and again sets up the cassette machine to record. He turns the stereo up full and dances by himself while watching MTV silent. He tries a turn which is a bit ambitious and loses hi balance. In slow motion we see him fall. Ben lies still on the floor. He smiles to himself and decides top stay there for a while... FADE OUT:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SERA'S BEDROOM. LAS VEGAS - DAY Sera wakes up in bed next to Yuri. (The camera is high above the bed looking down.) She is completely drenched in sweat. A thin shaft o light comes from the crack in the drapes and falls across their bodies. Other than that, the room is in darkness. To get out of bed she would have to climb over him. She lies still. Yuri speaks without opening his eyes... YURI I missed you, Sera. You have been lonely? Sera blinks and turns her head towards him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm older now, Yuri. He puts his hand between her legs, over the sheets and grasps her there.

direction.raw_text: You have been lonely?

A man opposite Ben places a dollar bill on the stage and as the dancer squats down to pick it up he stares between her legs an winks. The Waitress puts down a styrofoam cup and a bottle of water in front of Ben but refuses to look at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three-fifty. Ben puts down a hundred on to her tray.

direction.raw_text: Could I have fives please? Keep one for yourself. This throws the Waitress for a loop.

direction.raw_text: . BATHROOM OF STRIP CLUB - NIGHT Ben drinks all of a fifth of bourbon. Other guys come and go, pissing against the urinal. Ben offers one of the guys a drink, the pianist from the trio. He takes a shot.

direction.raw_text: . STRIP CLUB - NIGHT Ben sits next to another man watching the show. On stage a tall blonde dances with her own reflection in a mirror. Ben turns to his neighbor.

direction.raw_text: . LA STREETS - NIGHT Ben drives in his car.

direction.raw_text: . SUNSET BOULEVARD - LATER THAT NIGHT Ben is cruising in his car, listening to 'Lonely Teardrops' again. He's looking for a prostitute. He sees a girl, but when he slows down she ducks into a doorway. He looks in his rear-view mirror and sees a cop car coming up fast. Ben panics for a second. There is a bottle between his legs. The cop car draws level and cruises alongside him for a while, but then puts its lights and siren on and speeds off, doing a U-turn. Ben continues and then sees an Hispanic girl and stops. He winds down the window. He is by now almost incoherent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERBSIDE - NIGHT The girl looks up and down the street and then walks over to the car and bends down to the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You wanna date? You wanna date me? The girl's eyes shift constantly from Ben to the street and then back again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll give you a hundred dollars for a straight forty- five minutes. You get the room. Ben shows her the money. HISPANIC GIRL (trying to take him) The room is twenty. You pay for it. Ben laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... but only because I think that the concept of surrender fits in with the big picture right now. How about over there? He gives her a twenty and indicates a motel across the street. She sets off and he gets out of the car. As he does, a wave of nausea hits him. He shakes his head violently and then lurches across the street, causing two cars to hit their brakes. The camera follows him into the dark parking lot of the motel, where the Hispanic girl is waiting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I canremember... if mywifeleffme... or Illeff her... bufuckittanyway... The girl laughs at Ben and says something in Spanish. Slowly the picture gets darker, until all that can be seen is the headlights from the passing cars on Sunset... and then... 33 INT. BEN'S HOUSE - DAWN Ben wakes up on the kitchen floor. The fridge door is open and its light is what lights Ben. Inside the fridge are one green pepper and four bottles of vodka. Without too much effort Ben feels for his wallet and sees that it is still there, as are his car keys. He closes the fridge door and in the green light from the window he lies still. The first birds start singing. (the birdsong continues through the following sequence, which does not have sync sound.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SUNSET BOULEVARD MOTEL. PARKING-LOT DUMPSTERS - NIGHT At the rear of the motel. Next to some garbage hoppers, the Hispanic girl hugging him and kissing his neck. He tries to kiss her on the mouth, but she turns her face away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S HOUSE - DAWN Ben lying on the floor, thinking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SUNSET BOULEVARD MOTEL. PARKING-LOT DUMPSTERS - NIGHT The Hispanic girl kneeling in front of him, unzipping his trousers. Through a gap in the fence, we see traffic going up and down Sunset.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S HOUSE - DAWN Ben lying on the floor, thinking... CUT TO:

direction.raw_text: . SUNSET BOULEVARD MOTEL. PARKING-LOT DUMPSTERS - NIGHT The girl takes his hand and kisses it. She begins sucking the fingers, taking the whole hand into her mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S HOUSE - DAWN Ben suddenly sits up and looks at his hand. His wedding ring has gone. He thinks about this for a long time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BANK - MORNING Ben waiting in line to cash a check. He looks unwell and is having difficulty standing straight. At last it is his turn. He goes to the counter and hands over a check to the girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... four thousand, six hundred dollars... one moment, sir... She looks at her computer read-out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That'll leave five dollars in your account. Would you sign the back of the check, please?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You couldn't cash it just like it is?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, sir. Is there a problem? Ben picks up a pen and tries to sign, but his hands are shaking so much that he cannot do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... to tell you the truth, I'm a little shaky right now. I just had a brain surgery... Why don't I come back after lunch, when I'm feeling a little better? We can take care of it then.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S BAR. LA. - MORNING Ben seated at the bar, a pile of bills in front of him. The Barman sets down a vodka, picks up the empty glass and takes some bills, shaking his head in disapproval. The TV is on, some game show as before, and Ben watches carefully, looking for a sign from the girl, but the show proceeds in its 'normal' fashion. The only difference is that the hostess is played by the girl in the bank. Ben grabs the Barman's attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think, when I'm done with this, I'll have gin and tonic... Bombay gin and tonic. The Barman loses it
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should be having coffee. Do you know what time it is? You're a young man. (calmer) It's none of my business, but if you could see what I see, you wouldn't do this to yourself. Ben is taken aback by the emotion in his voice. In his mind, cynicism and the desire to cry fight it out. He holds the emotion back, and looks down at the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I understand what you're saying... I appreciate your concern. Its not my intention to make you uncomfortable. Please... serve me today and I will never come in here again. (cheerful) If I do, you can eighty-six me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, sure, I can eighty-six you now if I want to. Stop fucking with me. I don't give a fuck what you do. He picks up a bottle of gin, fills a glass, slams it on the counter in front of Ben and knocks twice with his knuckles on the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the house, son. Ben looks at the TV for a sign. None is forthcoming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BANK - DAY Ben waiting in line again. The same Bank girl is there and she is dealing with her customers in the same inanely cheerful way that the game-show Hostess dealt with her prize- winners. She notices Ben waiting and an irritated look flashes over across her face. Ben studies her. She is pretty in an ordinary kind of way. We hear Ben's thoughts as voice- over (or maybe he says them out loud to himself).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you desirable? Are you irresistible? Maybe if you drank bourbon with me, it would help. Maybe if you kissed me and I could taste the sting in your mouth, it would help. Close-up on the Bank Girl as she does her thing, efficiently counting money, smiling, perfect teeth framed by a Cupid mouth. She is wearing a white blouse through which frilly lingerie can just be made out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you drank bourbon with me naked... if you smelled of bourbon as you fucked me, it would help... it would increase my esteem for you. If you poured bourbon on to your naked body and said to me... drink this... Camera moves in tighter on her face as she chats with a customer about the weather.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... if you spread your legs and had bourbon dripping from your breasts and you vagina and said drink here... then I could fall in love with you, because then I would have a purpose, to clean you up, and that would prove that I'm worth something. Id lick you clean so you could go away and fuck someone else.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Next! Ben takes a moment to come out of his reverie. He smiles and comes to the counter, completely in control of himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm back, I've got my check... and baby... I'm ready to sign. He flips the check over, makes sure she is watching and signs with a flourish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There... Steady as a fucking rock, excuse my French. (serious) Wanna have dinner with me? She counts the money out and glares at him as she hands it over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm glad you're feeling better. Do you need a validation? Ben looks at her and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SUPERMARKET - DAY Ben throws items into a trolley. Garbage bags, firelighters and charcoal lighter fluid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S KITCHEN - DAY Ben putting all the kitchen utensils into a large garbage bag. Three other bags are already filled and the kitchen is looking empty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S BEDROOM - DAY Ben is stuffing all the bedding into a garbage bag.  Next he opens a drawer on the dresser and begins taking out clothes and stuffing them into another bag. He pauses for a moment to take a drink from a tall glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S LIVING ROOM - DAY All the books from the bookcase go into another bag. Then all the records. But he selects certain favorites and as this sequence progresses we can see that Ben is making tapes of these tracks. As soon as he is done with the recording, he throws the album into a garbage bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S YARD - NIGHT Ben pours lighter fluid on to a pile of photographs and then throws a match on to it. It bursts into flames. He throws more stuff on and the fire blazes. A curious neighbor watches from a safe distance, not wanting too get involved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A watercolor, a poem to his wife, photograph of him and his wife, a Polaroid of a naked woman, his medical records, his birth and marriage certificates, divorce papers, strips of photographs from booths, postcards from Hawaii. Two small children (his?). ANGLE ON BEN Now the flames are high and Ben has to stand back as he throws things on to the fire ... his camera, an engraved box, his wife's 'left behind' clothing , a clock... CUT TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S HOUSE - DAWN Fifteen neatly tied garbage bags and Ben's furniture are stacked up on the sidewalk. Ben comes out of his front door carrying a racing bike. He walks to the neighbors' house and places the bike on the porch. We see a label saying 'To Brad from Ben'. He walks to his black car with a small suitcase, gets in and drives off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DESERT LANDSCAPE WITH ROAD - DAY A high wide shot shows a small black car making its way across the frame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAR - DAY Through the window we see a dead straight road stretching to infinity. The sunlight is painfully bright. On the soundtrack we hear one of Ben's chosen tapes, which continues through into the next shot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GAS STATION IN THE DESERT - DAY Ben is filling his car. A Town Car drives in and stops next to the BMW. Three men get out. They look like Russian Mobsters. Ben nods at them and they nod back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAR - NIGHT Same angle through the window but this time we see Las Vegas at night as Ben drives down the main drag. An overdose of neon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LAS VEGAS STRIP - NIGHT Ahead we see the light changing, but Ben doesn't notice until it's almost to late. The car stops and we see Sera crossing in front of the car. She gives Ben a look of real attitude because he is over the line and she has to change course to cross in front.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HOTEL FORECOURT - NIGHT Sera is talking to Yuri. A middle-aged man gets out of a cab and Yuri shakes him by the hand and introduces him to Sera. He hands Yuri an envelope and then Sera and he go into the hotel together. Yuri looks around thoughtfully before getting into a cab and driving off.

direction.raw_text: All rooms to be paid a week in advance, maid service is optional, use of the pool is at your own risk, there is no lifeguard on duty. Above the manager's head is the name of the motel, The Whole Year Inn. Ben stares at it and then smiles.

direction.raw_text: . THE STRIP - NIGHT Ben driving. He sees Sera and follows her, then drives up on the sidewalk. She sees him.

direction.raw_text: Hello!

He is quite taken with her beauty, but this is not going according to plan. He reaches into the car quickly and picks an open can of bee, draining it before tossing the empty back on to the rear seat.

direction.raw_text: I'm sort of curious... if you're willing to pay me two- fifty... not that I mind... I mean, I'm OK with that - why aren't you staying in a hotel?

direction.raw_text: We can go to one if you'd prefer.

direction.raw_text: No, this is fine.  I was just wondering. Ben switches off the engine but makes no move to get out of the car.

direction.raw_text: Well... I'm here because I'm a drunk who tends to pass out at odd hours for unpredictable stretches. I'm going to a hotel soon. A room with a balcony to pass out on... or off. He falls silent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Umm. We can stay in the car for an hour if you want. But I really have to go then. It's your time. BEN Right, I'll get your door. I tend to fade in and out lately.

direction.raw_text: You what?

direction.raw_text: You were going to get my door. He gets out and she waits for him to open the door. She gets out and he offers her his arm. She takes it and they walk into the motel.

direction.raw_text: Of course. Ben smiles, happier than we've ever seen him. He gets her order ready and then he takes a big swig from a bourbon bottle. He sits on the edge of the bed. The bathroom door opens and Sera comes in wearing a black bra and panties. She's acting the hooker now, tough and sexy.

direction.raw_text: For two-fifty we can do pretty much what you want. You've been drinking, so it might be better if I got on top, but the other way's fine too. She sees a strange look on his face. It throws her. This is a turning point. Both of them are momentarily exposed. Ben lifts the sheet and moves to one side, indicating that she should come into the bed. She's as confused as he is. She gets in with him and he hands her the bottle.

direction.raw_text: . CASINO - NIGHT Yuri is losing at one of the tables. He continues to bet though, putting half of what he has left on one number. He lose again. He mops his face with a red silk handkerchief and places another bet.

direction.raw_text: No, I came here to drink... myself... you know... SERA To death?

direction.raw_text: Yes, that's right. He looks at her, she at him, not sure whether to believe him or not.

direction.raw_text: I cashed in all of my money, paid my AmEx card, gonna sell the car tomorrow.

direction.raw_text: Yeah. And your meter just ran out. Ben looks at his watch.

direction.raw_text: It's OK... nice watch. Go on. Talk some more. Ben yawns, suddenly deeply tired.

direction.raw_text: In LA I kept running out of booze and the store would be closed because I'd forget to look at my watch... so I decided to move here because nothing ever closes and because I got tired of getting funny looks when I would walk into a bar at six o'clock... even the bartenders started preaching. (yawns again) Here, everyone's from out of town so no one cares, no one is overtly fucking up
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera is in focus, Ben is asleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess I was intrigued by him... There was a lot of stuff that I wanted to ask him about but didn't because I didn't want to sound too interested in a trick. But I felt as if a relationship was being forged very quickly.

direction.raw_text: . PAWN SHOP - DAY The proprietor is handling over some cash to Yuri, whose jewelry is on the counter. He pockets it and as he turns to leave, Ben comes in. They pass without taking much notice of each other. Ben removes his Rolex and shows it to the man. CUT TO:

direction.raw_text: . STREET, LAS VEGAS - DAY Yuri is walking in the hot sun, sweating. We see him through long-lens heat haze. The camera wanders into the traffic and we see the black Town Car crawling along behind him, three men inside.

direction.raw_text: . DOCTOR'S OFFICE - DAY Improvised scene. (4)

direction.raw_text: . MAIN BAR, HOTEL - NIGHT A lounge singer belts out a fair rendition of a Tony Orlando number. Sera sits at the bar, an empty seat on either side of her. She watches a younger hooker in the final moments of pulling a dangerous-looking man. The girl is aware of Sera without even looking at her. The guy she is with looks around and sees Sera. The girl shoots an icy look. A man sits next to Sera: a conventioneer.

direction.raw_text: . THE STRIP - NIGHT Sera at work is looking more carefully than usual, hoping to see Ben. A huge silver limo pulls up and, after some negotiation, she gets in. CUT TO:

direction.raw_text: . THE STRIP - NIGHT Long-lens shot of Ben, very drunk on the street. He falls and lies still for quite a long time before getting up. He falls into the road and tries to hail a cab, but none stops. A cop car cruises to a halt and Ben more or less imitates a normal person as he walks out of shot.

direction.raw_text: . THE POOL, MOTEL - DAY Ben dives in and swims a length under water. He pulls himself out and sits next to the large Midwestern family. The father says hello and introduces his family to Ben. They are all very friendly. It's a nice atmosphere around this pool and for a moment Ben even looks healthy.

direction.raw_text: . THE STRIP - NIGHT A limo pulls up and Sera gets out. She sees something.

direction.raw_text: Ben sitting at a bus stop, drinking out of a cocktail glass. When he sees her he gets up, a little unsteadily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I couldn't remember what happened last time. I was afraid that I might have been rude, or mean to you. He looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I was I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, just drunk... but that's OK. Where's your car?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I sold it this morning. I'm going to take cabs from now on in. Sera looks up and down the strip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't run away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why should I? I know you're not a cop, so what is it tonight? Another two-fifty to watch you sleep? Ben sits down, a little hurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's up?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was looking for you tonight. I don't know if you have a boyfriend... He thinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... or a girlfriend, but if you have some free time... maybe we could have dinner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you serious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you know I'm serious. I'll pay you if you like... but I'd like to see you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I can't have dinner with you. And she hails a taxi, which stops immediately and she gets in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mojave Hotel, please. Ben watches the cab drive off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORRIDOR OF HOTEL - NIGHT Sera walks along, checking numbers on the doors. She finds the right one and knocks firmly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes? What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's me, Yuri. The door opens a crack and Yuri peers out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera! It's... He looks around for a clock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... it's late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . YURI'S ROOM - NIGHT Sera comes into the room, takes her purse out and counts out seven hundred dollars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, Yuri... good night... lots of tricks... I think things are picking up. Yuri sits on the bed. He looks unwell and disoriented. His face is covered with a thin film of sweat. He seems to be listening for something, because he stops her talking by putting his fingers to his lips. He looks at her and then beckons her to the bed. Sera is nervous. As she walks to the bed, she begins unbuttoning her blouse. Yuri stops her with a wave of his hand. Sera is puzzled and frightened now. Yuri seems to be deranged.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you told anyone that I'm here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Yuri suddenly hears something. He grabs Sera's hand and takes her to the wall. He presses her head to the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you here that? He looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're talking about me. He pulls himself together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go, Sera. (whispers) Go. Stay at home. I will call you tomorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yuri... are you... YURI (patiently) Sera... please go. He indicates the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is very important... and I must listen. Now go. They face each other for a moment and then Yuri does an almost comic gesture to tell her to go. He hustles her to the door and shoves her out as she is still buttoning up her blouse. He slams the door. YURI (through the door) Goodbye, Sera. Don't come back here. I will not see you again. Sera stands there for a while, almost in shock, and then she begins to walk. The camera follows her as she makes her way down the endless corridor of doors. Ahead of her, three men are walking towards her, checking the door numbers as they make their way. Sera doesn't take them in. They pass and turn a corner. We recognize them as the men from the black Town Car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The men have stopped outside Yuri's room. The camera pans and we see Sera down the other corridor getting into the elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S ROOM AT THE MOTEL - NIGHT Ben is lying on the bed watching a game show, drinking. A coughing fit hits him. He is very short of breath. We see how ill he really is. There is a tap at the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No thanks... I'm fine. The tapping persists and eventually Ben gets off the bed and unlocks it, but keeps the chain on. It is Sera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still want to have dinner? Ben stares at her for a while.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have to change and take a shower first. If you want to come home and wait. Ben opens the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We should pick up a bottle of tequila on the way. I owe you one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SERA'S HOUSE - NIGHT Sera is finishing in the shower and Ben is sitting at the kitchen table. He gets up and walks around the house, trying to get a sense of her. The furniture is very plain and there is spartan quality about the hose. He looks with interest at the bookshelf, which has a good selection of literature. BEN (to himself) This is the home of an angel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You OK out there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Take your time. I'm fine. He pours himself another drink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pour yourself another drink. He sots down and she comes in, toweling her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You OK?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. Wow... you look extremely beautiful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. What time is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't know. My watch went the way of the car. He holds up his empty wrist for her to see. Then looks up and sees her watching him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm rambling. I really like you. You make me want to talk... I don't know what time it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like hearing you talk. (businesslike) If you feel up to a short walk, there's a place to eat around the corner. All the food in Vegas is terrible so the place doesn't really matter. How does that sound to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do they have drinks?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE STRIP - NIGHT Ben and Sera walk and talk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RESTAURANT - NIGHT Ben and Sera are eating. He plays with his food, eating very little of it. Finally he pushes it away and orders another drink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm from the East. I went to college, did an arts course. I now live in Vegas. I think of it as home. I came here deliberately to carve out a life. I was in LA before, but I'll come back to that later. (pause) The tough times are behind me now. I can deal with the bad things that happen. There will always be dark characters. But my life is good. It is as I would want it to be. So, why are you a drunk? BEN Is that really what you want to ask me? SERA Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, then I guess this is our first date... or our last. Until now, I wasn't sure it was either.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very clever. Sera thinks for a while and decides to give in to him on this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First. It's our first. I'm just concerned. So... why are you killing yourself?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Interesting choice of words. I don't remember. I just know that I want to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Want to kill yourself? Are you saying  that you're drinking as a way to kill yourself? And she leans across the table to be close to him, listening intently. Ben becomes uncomfortable and tries to joke it off. BEN Or killing myself as a way to drink. Sera continues to stare at him, wanting to know the real answer. He takes a slug from his drink. She sits back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll talk about it some other time maybe. OK? Sera relaxes and continues with her food. We hear her thoughts for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wasn't so important to me. I mean, he never asked me why I was a hooker, sand that was impressive. I really liked him. So I decided to just play my part. I mean... it's good to help someone once in a while., it's a bonus to being alive, and that was my plan... to stay alive. I suddenly came to a decision.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you thinking? Are you angry with me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben, why don't you stay at my place tonight? I mean... look, you're so drunk. I like you. I trust you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's astonishing. Sera, look... SERA I hate to think of you in that cheesy motel. I mean... And she folds her arms and grins at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's face it, what the fuck are you doing in Las Vegas?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to move to a smart hotel, tomorrow if it'll make you feel better. (looks at her) Let's talk about tomorrow. Wanna do something?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure... tonight. Then please stay at my place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera... you know I'm not much good in the sack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not about sex, Ben. I'll make you up a bed on the sofa. Do it for me. We can talk till late and then sleep till late. As you know, I am my own boss. Ben laughs loud, the most animated we've seen him, and his laugh as infectious, and Sera join in. Other diners turn to stare at them. They seem like a couple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE STRIP - NIGHT Ben and Sera walk and talk, holding hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DESERT - DAY A wide shot. The black Town Car makes its way across frame. Left to right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SERA'S house - day Ben is asleep on the sofa. As he wakes up, he becomes aware that Sera is watching him from across the room. They smile at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long have I been her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three nights, two days. When is your rent coming up at the motel?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. (sits up) I'll go and sort it out today. Why don't you come?... We'll find a real room for me. You can pick it out, a tower on the strip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's no reason to blow all your money on a hotel room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What I mean is that you should bring your stuff over here. We're spending all this time together... what the fuck!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera... SERA Let's face it, Ben, we're having fun here. I've never done so much talking in my life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So! Let's dispense with the formalities. I want you here... now!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera you are crazy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So... I'm not too concerned with long term plans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you think you'll get a little bored living with a drunk?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is what I want. Why don't you go and get your stuff?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You haven't seen the worst of it. These last few days I've been very controlled. I knock things over... I throw up all the time. (looks at her) Now I feel really good... You're like some kind of antidote that mixes the liquor and keeps me in balance, but that won't last forever. You'll get tired of it really quickly. Believe me. They sit in silence for a while.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: you go back to your hotel and I'll go back to my glamorous life of being alone. She walks out of the room, and into the bathroom, where she sits on the toilet to pee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The only thing I have to come home to is a bottle of Listerine to wash the taste of come out of my mouth. I'm tired of being alone... that's what I'm tired of. She finishes, wipes herself and flushes the toilet. Pulling up her panties, she walks back into the bedroom, where Ben is putting on his shoes. SERA Don't you like me, Ben?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be silly? Ben is unable to deal with the fact that he is absolutely in love with her. He walks out of the room. She foolows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We gotta decide this... right now. Before we go any further. You either stay here with me or... Ben turns to look at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... we can't see each other any more. Ben and Sera look at each other for a long time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera... what you don't understand is... SERA What? Ben is deeply troubled. He comes to a decision.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can never... never... ask me to stop drinking. Do you understand?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do. I really do. (smiles)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . I have to do some shopping alone. You go out for a few drinks and then pick up your things. Don't hurry and I'll be back before you to let you in. Sera grabs him in a big embrace that knocks him off balance and into the wall. She kisses him all over his face and squeezes his skinny frame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S ROOM AT THE MOTEL - DAY Ben is packing his liquor into his suitcase. The almost-empty bottles he pours into a large cup, which he drinks from. The suitcase is now full and Ben suddenly realizes that he hasn't packed any clothes. They are all in a pile on the bed. He talks to himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe this isn't a good idea after all. He tries to put clothes in with the bottles, but the lid won't close. He sits on the bed and has an imaginary conversation with Sera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, angel... the thing is that I'm nuts about you and this is a bad thing... because my real plan is to die here and you were never even part of my plan... but like I said, I'm nuts about you... wait a minute, I have an idea, angel. And he opens the closet and finds some plastic laundry bags, which he puts his clothes in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SERA'S HOUSE - DAY Sera's neighbors, a husband and wife, are standing outside her house. They stop her. They are also her landlord.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We didn't know whether to call the police or not. And they indicate the sleeping figure of Ben, in the doorway, clutching a bottle of bourbon, using hi suitcase as a pillow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's been there for about half an hour. My husband thought he'd seen you two together, but I thought it best to wait until you got home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, he's my friend. I guess he just had a little too much to drink. (smiling uncomfortably) I'll help him inside. (puts down her packages) Thanks for the concern. Sorry to trouble you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, call me if there's anything I can do. They go to their own house. Sera opens the front door, kneels down next to Ben and shakes him gently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you wake up? Ben opens his eyes and looks around with a pleasant, cheerful expression.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you go in and sit down. I have some gifts for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right... OK... Ben stands and almost loses his balance. He picks up his suitcase and attempts to pick up her packages as well, but she stop him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry... I got'em. Ben staggers in with his case. As Sera enters, she looks around and sees Husband and Wife at the window, still watching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wanna go out tonight?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seriously, Ben... I need to keep pretty low-key around here. Maybe next time you could nap this side of the door. That was the landlord.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. She reaches into her purse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gift number one. And she gives him a newly cut key. He takes it and tries it in the lock, then drops it into his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I used to carry a lot of keys, but one by one they all fell victim to the great condensation. Now I have just this one... which is... And he tails off and stares at the floor. She waits for him to continue and then comes to him and touches him on the arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SERA'S HOUSE - DAY SERA Ben?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry. He shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was miles away. He sees the parcels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah... more gifts. I have to sit down for this. He strides into the living room and flops on to the sofa. She follows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera, I love that name... S.E.R.A. Before we proceed onwards, there is something I need to say. OK?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've come this far... here I am, in your house. I want you to let me pay the rent for this month. All right? And he stares at her as if to say that nothing can happen until this matter is resolved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because... it's better for me that way. OK?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... OK... She is uncomfortable. They sit in silence for a while.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera... I hope that you understand how I feel about this. First of all, you're welcome to my money. We can buy a couple of cases of liquor and you can have the rest. But I don't think you're talking to me right now about money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I think you're talking about you. I'll tell you right now that I'm in love with you... but, be that as it may, I'm not here to force my twisted life into your soul.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know that... BEN ... and I'm not here to demand your attention to the point where it changes your life. We know I'm a drunk... but that seems to be all right with you. And I know that you're a hooker. I hope you understand that I'm a person who is totally at ease with this... which is not to say that I'm indifferent or that I don't care... I do... it simply means that I trust and accept your judgement. What I'm saying is... that I hope you understand that I understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, I do understand. I was worried about how that would be... but now I'm not. And you should know that included with the rent here is a complimentary blow job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, yes... I suppose sooner or later we ought to fuck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever that means. Open your presents. She hands him the larger of the two parcels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open this one first. Ben awkwardly unwraps the present, a large, colorful shirt. A genuine smile comes on to his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very nice. He holds the shirt against himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This should work very nicely with my suit, which, by the way, is the only item of clothing I brought over from the motel with me. Sera raise an eyebrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right... the suitcase was clinking. So what did you do with your clothes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I threw them into the garbage., which was perhaps immoral, but I wanted to come to you clean, so to speak. I thought we could go shopping and pick up a pair of jeans and forty-five pairs of underwear and just throw them out each day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice talk, Ben. Keep drinking. In between the hundred and one proof breath and the occasional drool, some interesting words fall from your mouth. She hands him the last present.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, try this one. Ben unwraps the smallest gift. It is a silver hip flask. He is very touched and a little tear trickles down his cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... looks like I'm with the right girl. He turns it in his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I must say that I'm very impressed that you would buy this for me. I know you wouldn't do this without thinking about it. Funny... you did just what I would have done. Ben stands and tries the flask in his pocket for fit. It is fine. He walks to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to fill it right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you want to go gambling tonight? We could go out and play for a few hours. Ben comes back into the room, takes the flask out of his suit pocket and has a drink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hadn't planned to gamble... but if you would keep the bulk of my money here, then I could safely blow a couple of hundred bucks. He takes out all of his money, peels off a few hundreds and then gives her the rest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Giving you money makes me want to come.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then come. (pause) I'm going to change. Watch TV. I'll be half an hour. And she leaves. There is a slight edge to her voice and Ben is not sure if he offended her or not. He watches through the small angle of the door as she changes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am planning to go out and do some work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tomorrow night as a matter of fact.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE STRIP - NIGHT Ben and Sera walking. The camera follows them. He is wearing his new shirt and looks good in it. She is wearing a green dress and mismatched earrings and looks great. They walk and talk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like your earrings. He changes sides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like women who wear mismatched earrings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, then... I hope we don't run into any tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I expect some kind of loyalty here. Just because I fuck for money doesn't give you cause to start picking up women and leaving me looking silly. And she stops and looks at him, smiling but serious. BEN And I only have eyes for you. And we both know that you would never become romantically involved with a trick, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CASINO - NIGHT They walk around the huge space, which is full of people and energy, and suddenly Ben grabs Sera and pushes her against a slot machine and kisses her deeply. At first she resists and then she gives in to him and responds. They knock over some change, which falls to the floor, and Ben pulls from her a beat to bend down and scoop up all the change and hand it to the bemused player, before returning to Sera's mouth or more. They break for air and then Ben leads her towards the bar. As he waves to attract the barman's attention, she squeezes his arm. SERA (quietly) I love you. But he doesn't hear her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On long lens we see Ben and Sera at the bar. Suddenly Ben seems to fall asleep. Sera tries to wake him and then he goes crazy and falls backwards off his stool, knocking a waitress and her drinks over. Security Guards appear and begin arguing with Sera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SERA'S HOUSE - NIGHT Ben wakes up on the sofa, fully dressed. A night-light gives a soft glow. He rolls off the sofa, landing on all fours on the floor. He crawls to the kitchen , opens the fridge door and takes out a vodka bottle and carton of orange juice. With difficulty he gets to his feet, finds a glass and pour s a drink. He swallows the mix and then stands over the sink just in case he has to vomit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SERA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT Sera wakes and Ben comes in and gets into bed with her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very well... umm... I never expected to have to ask you this again... but how did our evening go? I remember getting to the casino... I remember kissing you... that was really nice but everything after that is a blank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well - I was prepared for worse, but it wasn't so bad. We were sitting at the bar, talking about blackjack. You seemed just fine, a little drunker than usual, but nothing really strange, but then your head started to droop and I put my arm on your shoulder and then, wham, you swung you arm at me, and fell backwards off your stool into a cocktail waitress. You smashed everything on her tray, it was a real mess. You kept yelling and yelling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, and what did you do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I tried to shut you up and help you to your feet but you kept swinging at me - not like you wanted to hit me, but more just waving me away. Security came and when you saw them you stopped yelling. They wanted to carry you out and dump you on the street, but I talked them into letting me walk you out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's impressive. How did you do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told them you were an alcoholic and T would take you home. I also promised that we would never come in there again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, we.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened then?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were OK for a while, so we walked for about a block and then you said you wanted to go home and fuck, but I think even you knew that wasn't going to happen. We got a cab and you asked him to stop at a liquor store, even though I told you that we had plenty at home. In the store you gave the kid a hundred and told him to keep the change. I asked you if you knew it was a hundred. You said you did, so I let you do it. We got here, you fell asleep on the couch and I covered you up and came to bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I warned you... (kisses her hand) ... but I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here's my speech... (kisses his hand) ... I know this shouldn't be acceptable to m, but it is. Don't ask me why. I sense that your trouble is very big... and I'm scared for you... and so I'm doing what I think you need me to do. Falling down in casinos is little stuff. It doesn't bother me. It has nothing to do with us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's amazing. What are you? Some sort of angel visiting me from one of my drunk fantasies? How can you be so good? She turns away to the wall and curls up like a small girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what you're saying. I'm just using you. I need you. Can we not talk about it any more, please. Not another word. He thinks about this. He gently pushes her until she is lying on her front and then he pulls up her nightdress and strokes her naked back. He kisses her in the small of her back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you go back to sleep. I'll go out and buy us some breakfast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be careful. He stands and goes to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry. As he leaves the room, she calls after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben, I'm  working tonight. He opens the door and smiles at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SIDEWALK - EARLY MORNING Ben gets out of his  cab and walks up to the doorway of a grocery store. It is locked. Ben looks at his wrist and then remembers that he no longer has a watch. He looks around, sees something and exits frame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOTEL ROOM - DAWN In the half-light Sera gets up and walks with difficulty to the bathroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BATHROOM - DAWN She clicks on the mirror light. Her face is awful. One eye is swollen almost shut. Her top lip is cut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAB - EARLY MORNING Sera gets into the cab with considerable difficulty. The cab driver is a cynic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the matter, honey, get a back-door delivery you weren't expecting? You gonna be able to pay the fare? Without speaking she takes out a twenty, leans forward and drops it on the front passenger seat. He drives. Looks at her in the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, don't wanna talk to me, unh? Well, don't take it out on me, I'm just covering my ass. What the hell do you expect, stuttin' around like that... dressed like that? You oughta be glad the creep didn't nail ya.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SERA'S HOUSE - MORNING As the cab drives off, Sera walks slowly to the door. Her Landlord's wife passes and takes in her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SERA'S SHOWER - DAY Sera is slumped on the floor of the shower, her arms hugging her legs, the water pounding down on her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SERA'S HOUSE - DAY Sera opens the door and we see the Landlord. Behind him, on the sidewalk, we can see his wife. He is embarrassed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sera, wearing dark glasses. She looks terrible. Her mouth is swollen and some of the bruising around her eye is visible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry... but we'd like you out by the end of the week.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . WHOLE YEAR INN - DAY Sera gets out of a cab and goes into reception. She is wearing huge dark glasses to hide the black eye and the bruising.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HOTEL - DAY The desk clerk is wearing a shirt of Ben's that we recognize from an earlier scene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, ma'am. He never checked back in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE STRIP - NIGHT Sera walks alone. She's dejected as she looks for Ben.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CASINO - NIGHT Sera comes to an elevator and waits. She is wearing a thin black top without a bra. Her bruised face makes her suddenly very conspicuous and vulnerable. A big man in a white stetson stands next to her. He looks at her and grins. She smiles, coldly. He takes from his pocket two black, hundred dollar chips, places one in each hand and deliberately places each one against her nipples. Other people see this and stop and watch. Sera looks down at his hands and stares until the man becomes uncomfortable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the problem, honey?... You on strike? And he walks away laughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 7-ELEVEN - DAY Sera is sitting on a freshly-painted red kerb. She smokes a cigarette and doesn't give a damn that her short skirt is somewhat revealing. Opposite her a bum is sleeping on the pavement. For a moment it looks like Ben. The camera comes in tight on to her face. She looks more lost that we've ever seen her. She drinks coffee from a styrofoam cup. The sun is bright and hot and traffic is noisy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DOCTOR'S OFFICE - DAY Improvised scene. (5)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CASINO - NIGHT Sera comes in and the camera follows her as she makes her way to the bar. She has covered up much of the bruising with make-up but it is still pretty obvious. In wide shot we see her strike up a conversation with the man next to her at the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A hand comes in to shot and grips her arm firmly. We see that it is a casino security guard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let go. What's the problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't want you in here, that's the problem. Let's go. And he jerks her arm. People are watching now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry... If you don't want me in here, then I don't want to be in here. Just let go of my arm and I'll walk out of here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah... we'll both walk out now. He steers her firmly across the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CASINO. NIGHT They reach the sidewalk and, without relaxing his grip, he grabs her between the legs with his free hand and says in her ear:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Next time it won't be so fucking easy. And he pushes her towards the street and walks back into the Casino. Sera is shocked. She looks around and the group of people who have stopped to watch the event move away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SERA'S HOUSE - DAY Sera is throwing clothes into a suitcase.  The phone rings. She thinks about it for a long time and then it stops. She carries on packing and then the phone rings again. She pick it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello... hello... (suddenly alert) Ben? Where the fuck are you? Give me the address.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAB - LATE AFTERNOON The driver is black and friendly. The radio drones quietly  - a religious program. The Rev. Ike is taking listeners' calls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What in the hell happened to you, Miss?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh... it was an argument. BLACK DRIVER Leave him, Miss. Pretty girl like You could get any man that You wanted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S MOTEL ROOM - DUSK The door opens. Ben is naked. His body looks bad. Leaving the door open, he retreats to the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S MOTEL ROOM - NIGHT Sera comes in, closing the door behind her. The shades are drawn and the room is gloomy. Ben has got back into bed. She comes to the bed and sits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben... I've been looking for You. Have You been here since You left? It smells bad in here. It's so dark. She clicks on the bedside light and is truly shocked by his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanted to see you... SERA Oh, Ben... you look so very sick... my love... you're so pale. She goes to the bathroom and returns with a wet face-cloth. She wipes his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanted to see you... you're my angel. He sits up painfully and finds a bottle, summoning up some last strength to drink. His entire body shudders as he drains the bottle. He puts it down and focuses on her for the first time. H sees her damaged face, touches her face, looks at her questioningly. SERA Something went wrong... I'm OK. Ben begins to cry and that sets her off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry I put us asunder. She shakes her head, unable to speak for the moment. She gets into bed with him, kissing his face. She caresses his whole body, which is shaking, possessed by an uncontrollable fever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See how hard You make me angel. She excites him with her hand, kissing his face gently. When he is about to come, she straddles him and brings him inside. As he comes, he opens his eyes wide and looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know I love you... yeah? SERA (she comes) Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Sera is sleeping. A sudden gasp wakes her. Ben is having a spasm. Suddenly his body relaxes. He turns his head, opens his eyes wide and looks straight at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh... I'm so sorry... He smiles and turns his head away. He is very still.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben... Ben... Ben?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEN'S MOTEL ROOM - NIGHT In the darkened room we can just make out Sera sitting on the bed, looking at the still form of Ben.
direction.name: direction
